sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: EUDA Health Soars: Is a Boom Coming?
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited has seen its stock surge by over 39% due to significant developments, including the launch of a stem cell therapy platform in China and the integration of a QB utility token into its digital health platform. These strategic moves, coupled with a convertible warrant sale, aim to bolster the company's financial base and expand its healthcare services and customer engagement in Asia. While facing some liquidity challenges, the market appears receptive to EUDA's innovative approach in combining advanced medical technologies with fintech.

feed.title: EUDA Launches Stem Cell Therapy Platform with Shenzhen Clinic
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Ltd. has launched a comprehensive stem cell therapy platform and opened its first longevity clinic in Shenzhen, China. This initiative marks a significant step in the Singapore-based biotech company's longevity-focused strategy, combining regenerative medicine with customized health solutions. The new platform and clinic aim to address the growing demand for preventive healthcare in Asia's aging populations, offering advanced treatments like immune cell therapies, iPSC technology, and AI-driven health management.

feed.title: Euda Health Holdings Limited (EUDA) Stock Price | Live Quotes & Charts | NASDAQ
feed.summary: This article provides current stock information for Euda Health Holdings Limited (EUDA), including its live quotes and charts. It highlights a significant price increase of 42.72% for EUDA, trading at $2.74, and notes the absence of analyst ratings or earnings information. The piece also includes a promotional section for trade alerts and investment tools.

feed.title: EUDA Accelerates Longevity Strategy with Launch of Comprehensive Stem Cell Therapy Platform and First Clinic in Shenzhen
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited has significantly advanced its longevity and regenerative medicine strategy by launching a comprehensive stem cell therapy platform and its first clinic in Shenzhen, China. This initiative integrates existing acquisitions and partnerships to create a state-of-the-art production and innovation center for stem cell treatments. The new Shenzhen Longevity Clinic will offer advanced therapies, personalized AI-guided life cycle management, and integrated medicine, positioning EUDA as a leader in the fast-growing longevity sector.

feed.title: EUDA’s Recent Jump: Should Investors be Cautious?​
feed.summary: Euda Health Holdings (EUDA) has seen its stock jump by 35.95% due to its bold integration of a cryptocurrency utility token into its healthcare platform and a $100,000 securities agreement. While these developments boost investor optimism, the company's financial health shows significant concerns, including sharply negative pretax profit margins and a large working capital deficit. Investors are advised to exercise caution due to the company's volatile nature and financial instabilities despite its innovative approach.

feed.title: EUDA Health launches stem cell therapy platform in Shenzhen
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited (NASDAQ:EUDA) has launched a stem cell therapy platform and its first longevity clinic in Shenzhen, China, aiming to accelerate its regenerative medicine business. The initiative involves upgrading a cGMP facility to an innovation center for stem cell treatments, incorporating proprietary iPSC technology, and establishing a longevity clinic offering various advanced therapies. Despite a recent 43.3% stock price decline, the company, valued at approximately $50.5 million, is pursuing strategic growth in the longevity sector.

feed.title: EUDA Accelerates Longevity Strategy with Launch of Comprehensive Stem Cell Therapy Platform and First Clinic in Shenzhen
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited (NASDAQ: EUDA) has significantly advanced its longevity and regenerative medicine strategy by launching a comprehensive stem cell therapy platform and establishing its first clinic in Shenzhen, China. This initiative includes upgrading Shenzhen Inno's cGMP facility for stem cell treatments and introducing Japanese longevity healthcare technologies through a partnership with KB International Ltd. The new clinic will offer advanced cell therapies, AI-guided life cycle management, and integrated medicine to focus on slowing biological aging and strengthening immunity.

feed.title: Inside a new Shenzhen clinic using stem cells to target aging
feed.summary: EUDA Health has launched a comprehensive stem cell therapy platform and opened its first longevity clinic in Shenzhen, China, on December 23, 2025. This initiative includes upgrading Shenzhen Inno's cGMP facility for iPSC and immune cell therapies and integrating technologies from Japanese partners and GO POSB. The new clinic will offer advanced cell therapies, AI-guided life-cycle management, and integrated medical approaches to enhance longevity, despite a negative market reaction to the announcement.

feed.title: EUDA Integrates QB Utility Token to Create a Digital Health and Rewards Platform Across Its Healthcare Ecosystem
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited is integrating the QB utility token into its digital health and rewards platform to enhance customer loyalty and experience across its healthcare ecosystem. This strategic move allows customers and agents to earn and redeem QB tokens for EUDA's various healthcare offerings, creating a unified digital engagement platform built on Binance Smart Chain. The initiative supports EUDA's vision of a modern, interactive healthcare ecosystem that merges wellness, technology, and user interaction.

feed.title: EUDA Integrates QB Utility Token to Create a Digital Health and Rewards Platform Across Its Healthcare Ecosystem
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited (NASDAQ: EUDA) has announced the integration of the QB utility token into its digital health and rewards platform. This strategic move, in collaboration with QB Limited, will allow customers and agents within the EUDA ecosystem to earn and redeem QB tokens for a range of EUDA healthcare offerings, enhancing loyalty and user engagement. The QB token, built on Binance Smart Chain, aims to unify EUDA's healthcare and rewards ecosystem under a single digital framework, supported by advanced blockchain infrastructure for transparent and compliant transactions.

feed.title: EUDA Integrates QB Utility Token to Create a Digital Health and Rewards Platform Across Its Healthcare Ecosystem
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited (NASDAQ: EUDA) has announced the integration of the QB utility token into its digital health and rewards platform. This strategic move, in collaboration with QB Limited, will enable customers and agents within the EUDA ecosystem to earn and redeem QB utility tokens for various healthcare offerings, enhancing loyalty and customer experience. The initiative supports EUDA's vision of a highly interactive healthcare ecosystem that combines wellness, technology, and user engagement, with the QB token built on Binance Smart Chain and utilizing USD1 stablecoins for secure transactions.

feed.title: EUDA Health Holdings Plans To Create An Integrated Digital Health And Rewards Platform
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Ltd (EUDA) announced its intention to develop an integrated digital health and rewards platform. This new platform will incorporate a utility cryptocurrency known as QB. The initiative aims to merge health services with a loyalty program, powered by digital currency.

feed.title: EUDA Plans to Integrate QB Utility Token into Its Healthcare Ecosystem
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited (NASDAQ: EUDA) plans to integrate a new utility cryptocurrency, QB, into its digital health and wellness ecosystem. Scheduled for launch in January 2026, QB will facilitate payments and rewards for EUDA's healthcare products and services. The initiative aims to merge healthcare and decentralized finance, supporting long-term financial flexibility and blockchain innovation within the company.

feed.title: EUDA Health Holdings Limited Announces Execution of Securities Purchase Agreement
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited (NASDAQ: EUDA) announced it has entered a securities purchase agreement with Streeterville Capital, LLC, for the sale of a convertible warrant worth US$100,000. This warrant is exercisable for up to 2,000,000 newly issued EUDA ordinary shares at US$6.00 per share, strengthening the company's capital position and supporting its growth strategy in Asia's non-invasive healthcare market. The CEO, Mr. Alfred Lim, stated that this financing provides flexibility for high-return initiatives, including new centers and technology, to expand their healthcare ecosystem.

feed.title: EUDA Health secures $100,000 warrant agreement with Streeterville By Investing.com
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited has secured a $100,000 convertible warrant agreement with Streeterville Capital, LLC, allowing Streeterville to purchase up to 2 million ordinary shares at $6.00 per share. This move aims to strengthen EUDA Health's capital position and advance its growth strategy, particularly as the company, with an impressive 84% revenue growth in the last year, is projected to achieve profitability this fiscal year. The agreement also includes provisions for EUDA to require early exercise of the warrant under specific stock performance conditions.

feed.title: Euda Health Holdings enters securities purchase agreement for $100,000 convertible warrant
feed.summary: Euda Health Holdings (NASDAQ:EUDA) has announced a securities purchase agreement with an accredited investor for a $100,000 convertible warrant. This warrant allows the investor to buy up to 2,000,000 ordinary shares at $6.00 per share and is immediately exercisable for 90 days. The deal includes specific conditions for exercise, repurchase, and cashless exercise options under certain circumstances.

feed.title: Euda Health Holdings enters securities purchase agreement for $100,000 convertible warrant
feed.summary: Euda Health Holdings (NASDAQ:EUDA) has announced a securities purchase agreement with an accredited investor for a convertible warrant valued at $100,000. This agreement allows the investor to acquire up to 2,000,000 ordinary shares at an exercise price of $6.00 per share, exercisable for 90 days from issuance. The company retains the right to require exercise under specific conditions and has provisions for repurchasing unexercised portions or cashless exercise in certain scenarios.

feed.title: Euda Health Holdings enters securities purchase agreement for $100,000 convertible warrant
feed.summary: Euda Health Holdings Ltd (NASDAQ:EUDA) has announced a securities purchase agreement with an accredited investor for a $100,000 convertible warrant. This warrant allows the investor to buy up to 2,000,000 ordinary shares at an exercise price of $6.00 per share, exercisable for cash for 90 days with potential extensions. The agreement includes conditions for mandatory exercise by the company and options for cashless exercise if terms are breached or after the cash exercise period.

feed.title: EUDA Health Holdings Limited Announces Execution of Securities Purchase Agreement
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited (NASDAQ: EUDA) announced the execution of a securities purchase agreement with Streeterville Capital, LLC for the sale of a convertible warrant for US$100,000. This agreement, exercisable for up to 2,000,000 newly issued ordinary shares at US$6.00 per share, aims to strengthen EUDA’s capital position and support its growth strategy in Asia's non-invasive healthcare market. CEO Alfred Lim emphasized that this financing provides flexibility to invest in new centers, partnerships, and technology to expand their healthcare ecosystem.

feed.title: Check out EUDA Health Holdings Ltd's stock price (EUDA) in real time
feed.summary: This article provides real-time stock information for EUDA Health Holdings Ltd (EUDA) from CNBC. It includes key financial metrics such as current stock price, 52-week range, market capitalization, and recent news regarding convertible note conversion and board changes. The company's profile as a health technology firm operating a digital healthcare ecosystem in Southeast Asia is also detailed.

feed.title: EUDA Subsidiary CK Health Plus Expands into India in Strategic Partnership with SafeRock India
feed.summary: EUDA's subsidiary, CK Health Plus, is expanding its operations into India through a strategic partnership with SafeRock India. This move signifies EUDA Health Holdings Ltd's presence in the Indian market. The announcement was made through Reuters and Refinitiv.

feed.title: EUDA Health Holdings Announces Board Changes with New Director Appointment
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings announced changes to its board of directors. Wong Kong Yew resigned as an independent director and Chairman of the Compensation Committee on October 23, 2025, with no disputes cited. Huang Bo was appointed as an independent director, taking over Prof. Wong's roles, effective October 24, 2025, bringing significant management experience from biotechnology and technology firms.

feed.title: Euda Health Holdings appoints Huang Bo as independent director after board change
feed.summary: Euda Health Holdings (NASDAQ:EUDA) has appointed Huang Bo as an independent director, succeeding Wong Kong Yew who resigned from the board. Mr. Huang will also serve as Chairman of the Compensation Committee and a member of the Audit and Nomination Committees. His appointment follows Prof. Wong's resignation, which the company stated was not due to any disagreements regarding company operations.

feed.title: Euda Health Holdings appoints Huang Bo as independent director after board change
feed.summary: Euda Health Holdings (NASDAQ:EUDA) has appointed Huang Bo as an independent director and Chairman of the Compensation Committee, effective October 24. This appointment follows the resignation of Wong Kong Yew. Mr. Huang's background includes leadership roles in technology companies and he is currently a General Manager of a company that is a business partner of Euda Health Holdings.

feed.title: EUDA Health subsidiary expands into Indian wellness market
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited's subsidiary, CK Health Plus Sdn. Bhd., is entering the Indian wellness market through a partnership with SafeRock India Private Limited. This strategic move, focusing on non-invasive and preventive healthcare, aims to leverage India's expanding middle class and increasing focus on preventive healthcare for growth. The companies plan to build a sustainable wellness ecosystem using CK Health Plus’s Bioenergy Capsule Therapies and EUDA Helixé supplements, distributed by SafeRock India.

feed.title: EUDA (NASDAQ: EUDA) enters India through CK Health Plus–SafeRock master license deal
feed.summary: EUDA's wholly-owned subsidiary, CK Health Plus, is expanding into the Indian market through a strategic master license and representative partnership with SafeRock India. This agreement aims to distribute CK Health Plus' Bioenergy Capsule Therapies and EUDA Helixé supplements across major Indian cities including Mumbai and Bangalore, leveraging SafeRock India’s network for a network-marketing wellness ecosystem. The partnership targets India's growing wellness and preventive healthcare industry, offering both health solutions and entrepreneurial opportunities.

feed.title: EUDA Health Holdings Limited's (NASDAQ:EUDA) biggest owners are retail investors who got richer after stock soared 28% last week - simplywall.st
feed.summary: Retail investors are the largest ownership group in EUDA Health Holdings Limited (NASDAQ:EUDA) with 47%, benefiting significantly from a recent 28% stock surge. Key shareholders include Watermark Developments (26%) and insider Meng Dong Tan (24%), indicating considerable influence from the top two shareholders. Institutional ownership is currently small, but insider ownership is substantial at US$26 million.

feed.title: Breakthrough Stem Cell Deal: EUDA to Acquire GO POSB's Revolutionary iPSC Platform for Asia Expansion
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings has signed a Letter of Intent to acquire GO POSB Organoids, a Singapore biotechnology company specializing in induced pluripotent stem cell (iPSC) technology. This acquisition will enable EUDA to establish an iPSC laboratory and cultivation facility in Shenzhen, China, in collaboration with Singapore's A*STAR, to expand its stem cell treatments and supplements portfolio across Asia. The initiative aims to position EUDA as a key B2B supplier of iPSC solutions in the Chinese healthcare ecosystem, despite potential regulatory and commercialization challenges.

feed.title: EUDA Signs Letter of Intent to Potentially Acquire GO POSB
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited has signed a Letter of Intent to potentially acquire GO POSB Organoids Pte Ltd, a biotechnology company known for its induced pluripotent stem cell (iPSC) platform. The acquisition aims to expand EUDA's presence in the iPSC solution market, with plans to establish a laboratory in Shenzhen, China, and collaborate with Singapore's A*STAR for advanced research, clinical trials, and regulatory approvals. This strategic move aligns with EUDA's focus on longevity and regenerative health, extending its portfolio to B2B iPSC solutions and future wellness/aesthetics applications in Asia.

feed.title: EUDA Health Holdings Limited (NASDAQ:EUDA) stock most popular amongst retail investors who own 47%, while private companies hold 26%
feed.summary: Retail investors hold the largest share of EUDA Health Holdings Limited (NASDAQ:EUDA) stock at 47%, giving them significant influence over management and business strategy. Private companies follow with a 26% ownership stake, while institutional investors hold less than 5%. Insider ownership in EUDA Health Holdings is substantial at 24%, with the top two shareholders collectively owning 50% of the company.

The article highlights EUDA's business as a Singapore-based non-invasive healthcare provider and property management company.

feed.title: FAST NEWS: Euda Health acquires CK Health in $15 million deal
feed.summary: Singapore-based digital health platform EUDA Health Holdings Ltd. acquired Malaysian consumer wellness products provider CK Health Plus Sdn Bhd in a $15 million deal. This acquisition grants EUDA entry into healthcare markets in Malaysia, Vietnam, and Indonesia, diversifying its product portfolio and enhancing distribution channels. The deal represents approximately one-third of EUDA's current market value, and the company's shares have risen about 55% this year.

feed.title: EUDA Health Holdings Limited Announces Receipt of Nasdaq Listing Delinquency Letter
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited announced it received a delinquency notification from Nasdaq on April 5, 2023, for failing to file its Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2022. The company has 60 days to submit a compliance plan, and if accepted, could receive up to 180 days to file the report. The notice does not immediately impact the trading of EUDA's common stock, which remains listed on Nasdaq.

feed.title: 8i Acquisition 2 Corp. and EUDA Health Limited Complete Business Combination
feed.summary: 8i Acquisition 2 Corp. (LAX) and EUDA Health Limited have completed their business combination, forming EUDA Health Holdings Limited. The combined company will trade on Nasdaq under the symbols "EUDA" and "EUDAW" starting November 18, 2022. This merger aims to further EUDA Health's mission of making healthcare more affordable and accessible through its digital health platform, expanding its reach across the Asia Pacific region.
